findings.title: PayoutPool::processProposerExit() incorrectly updates latestProposerClaim
findings.description: The function PayoutPool.processProposerExit() incorrectly updates latestProposerClaim by setting it to claim instead of increasing it, allowing the same rewards to be claimed again.

findings.title: A01: PayoutPool::processProposerSlashing() incorrectly increases the rewards of the slashed proposer
findings.description: When a proposer is slashed, there is an over-distribution of the slashed amount on the proposer side, increasing the rewards available to all proposers, including the one being slashed.
